COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove another outdated assertion from SearchQueryThenFetchAsyncActionTests (#122086) (#125869) Same reasoning as in 2b410c44eb8fc684d3986247a49f9696b44f2d4c, with the now weaker ordering guarantees from optimizations this assertion stopped being reliable. back port of #122086 closes #122911
